DOC.brief_summary: To determine best time begin anti-HIV ( Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome ) treatment individual co-infected HIV tuberculosis ( Tb ) . This prospective , randomize study conduct HIV/Tb co-infected patient China evaluate compare efficacy antiretroviral therapy 2 week TB treatment versus defer ART initiate 8 week initiation TB treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome ( AIDS ) Tuberculosis ( Tb ) Co-infection Treatment Strategies Study China .
DOC.detailed_description: Anti-Tb Therapy : 2HREZ-4HRifb ( H : Isoniazid，R : Rifampicin，E : Ethambutol，Z：pyrazinamide，Rifb : Rifabutin ) HAART : The first line Zidovudine ( AZT ) +Lamivudine ( 3TC ) +Efavirenz ( EFV ) second line Stavudine ( D4T ) +3TC+EFV Study group one : anti-TB therapy 2 week begin High Active Antiretroviral Therapy ( HAART ) ; study group two : anti-TB therapy 8 week begin HAART . If begin HAART H change Rifb .
